column5: Looking at Nemeiben Lake this year... anyone been? How has netting up there been (I got burned last year on a lake that was heavily netted over the winter and don't want that to happen again)? I understand Lakers, Walleye and Pike are all available in this lake. Who has fished it recently? Is it worth the trip?Thanks.

I live in La Ronge Saskatchewan which is only about 12 miles from Nemebien lake. I can guarantee that you will have some good fishing but make sure you come in the spring or early summer. I have only fished Nemebien lake twice but have had good success catching pike, walleye, and lake trout. Take the trip I think you will enjoy it.
Thanks! I plan on trying for the end of May, so hopefully that will be early enough. You just made my mind up for me!
If you have any other questions let me know and I will try to help you. Would you consider a fly-in?

I think a fly in might be in the works for next year. Cost is always a factor, as is finding guys to go - everyone I used to go fishing with is recently married and on pretty short leashes - both $$$ and time wise. I figure give them a year and they should be ready to get away for a few days... <GRIN>
